step_feedback.feedback: Your shoulder and elbow movements were good. Try to keep your wrists closer to your body for better form.
Good job keeping your shoulders still. Focus on relaxing your wrists more as you place your hands on your abdomen.
Your shoulders and elbows are moving well. For the next repetitions, try to tighten your whole body muscles more firmly as you inhale.
You're doing great with the breathing. Try to relax your muscles more completely as you exhale to maximize the fluid visualization.

exercise_summary: You're doing a good job with your deep breathing exercises! Remember to keep your whole body tight when you inhale and fully relax when you exhale. This helps your lymphatic system work efficiently.
